0:
id: heisenbridge
url: http://heisenbridge:9898
as_token: fHzDW35fFZB9Yvu1rPW6kKqvaZJmQdB1ghgfbsZtlrFDyoTfN5ddfio1jrB25Qoc
hs_token: 0qQMO2VQvJkfwbNuVKolnrVQkovzyXuRcKoaQvrMO6sySwTem7hgkrsdBKY4cd36
rate_limited: false
sender_localpart: heisenbridge
namespaces:
    users:
    - regex: '@irc_.*'
      exclusive: true
    - regex: '@heisenbridge:.*'
      exclusive: true
    aliases: []
    rooms: []

version: 2
global:
  private_key: /etc/dendrite/matrix_key.pem
  server_name: "${SECRET_PRIVATE_DOMAIN}"
  well_known_server_name: "dendrite.${SECRET_PRIVATE_DOMAIN}:443"
  well_known_client_name: "https://dendrite.${SECRET_PRIVATE_DOMAIN}:443"
  database:
    connection_string: postgresql://dendrite:${SECRET_DENDRITE_DB_PASSWD}@postgresql/dendrite?sslmode=disable
  cache:
    max_size_estimated: 600mb
  report_stats:
      enabled: true
  jetstream:
    storage_path: "/jetstream"
app_service_api:
  config_files:
    []
media_api:
  base_path: /media
client_api:
  registration_shared_secret: "${SECRET_DENDRITE_REGISTRATION_SHARED_SECRET}"
mscs:
  mscs:
    - msc2836 # Threading
    - msc2946 # Spaces
    - msc2444 # Peeking over federation
    - msc2753 # Peeking via sync
sync_api:
  search:
    enabled: true
    base_path: /search
    language: "en"
logging:
  - type: std
    level: debug
A modern, secure, highly customizable application dashboard.
The DNSSEC signature for the {{ "{{ $labels.record }}" }} in {{ "{{ $labels.zone }}" }} is expiring

The DNSSEC signature for the {{ "{{ $labels.record }}" }} in {{ "{{ $labels.zone }}" }}
on resolver {{ "{{ $labels.resolver }}" }} is invalid

while true ; do
  printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Fetching metrics ..."
  curl -s 'http://snmp-exporter-sr505n:9116/snmp?module=sr505n_dsl&target=192.168.1.1' | sponge /config/sr505n.prom
  printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Fetch complete."
  sleep 300
done

[ups-1]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  # pollinterval = 15
  desc = "APC Back-UPS Pro 1500"
  # vendorid = "051D"
  # productid = "0002"
  product = "Back-UPS RS 1500G FW:865.L9 .D USB FW:L9"
  serial = "4B2107P01305"
  # vendor = "American Power Conversion"
  # bus = "001"
# [ups-2]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.82
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"
# [ups-3]
#   driver = snmp-ups
#   privProtocol=AES
#   port = 192.168.3.83
#   desc = "APC Smart-UPS 750"

[admin]
  password = secret
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon master
[upsmon]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave

MONITOR ups-1@localhost 1 admin secret master
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15
